ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] More women playing EQ lately?
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure how true this is but it would be exciting to know that it is true.  Have been playing another game (my bad) where i would have to say the majority of
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure how true this is but it would be exciting to
know that it is true. Have been playing another game
(my bad) where i would have to say the majority of
female characters ARE played by men...

Amaiya (no surname picked yet,who REALLY IS a girl)
Lvl 20 Druid, Fenin Ro

--- "J. Smythe" <lgumaer@...> wrote:
> I just noticed recently that I seem to be running
> into more women while running around Norrath. I mean
> characters played by women, is there any truth to
> this, or did I just not care in the past and didn't
> notice? That would be really cool if it were true.
>
>
>
